metadata.title: CVE-2021-47342 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: fix possible UAF when remounting r/o a mmp-protected file systemAfter commit 618f003199c6 ("ext4: fix memory leak inext4_fill_super"), after the file system is remounted read-only, thereis a race where the kmmpd thread can exit, causing sbi->s_mmp_tsk topoint at freed memory, which the call to ext4_stop_mmpd() can tripover.Fix this by only allowing kmmpd() to exit when it is stopped viaext4_stop_mmpd().Bug-Report-Link: <20210629143603.2166962-1-yebin10@huawei.com>

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
